debates.showAs: Civil Liability (Child Sexual Abuse Proceedings Against Unincorporated Bodies of Persons) Bill 2025: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to facilitate the bringing of child sexual abuse proceedings against unincorporated bodies of persons, to enable such a body to pay damages arising from such proceedings from the assets of an associated trust in certain circumstances, to extend the limitation period provided for by the Statute of Limitations 1957 in respect of certain civil proceedings arising from claims of child sexual abuse, and to provide for connected matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht d’éascú imeachtaí mar gheall ar dhrochúsáid ghnéasach leanaí a thionscnamh i gcoinne comhlachtaí neamhchorpraithe daoine, dá chumasú do chomhlacht den sórt sin damáistí a eascraíonn as imeachtaí den sórt sin a íoc as sócmhainní iontaobhais chomhlachaithe in imthosca áirithe, d’fhadú na tréimhse teorann dá bhforáiltear le Reacht na dTréimhsí, 1957 i leith imeachtaí sibhialta áirithe a eascraíonn as éilimh gur tharla drochúsáid ghnéasach leanaí, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe comhghaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Civil Liability (Child Sexual Abuse Proceedings Against Unincorporated Bodies of Persons) Bill 2025
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Dhliteanas Sibhialta (Imeachtaí i gcoinne Comhlachtaí Neamhchorpraithe Daoine mar gheall ar Dhrochúsáid Ghnéasach Leanaí), 2025

debates.showAs: Children and Family Relationships (Amendment) Bill 2023: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Children and Family Relationships (Amendment) Bill 2023: Second Stage [Private Members]
Children and Family Relationships (Amendment) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Children and Family Relationships Act 2015; to provide for expanded pathways to parentage for parents of donor conceived children.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Leanaí agus Cóngais Teaghlaigh, 2015; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le conairí leathnaithe chun tuismíochta do thuismitheoirí leanaí deontóir-ghinte.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Leanaí agus Cóngais Teaghlaigh (Leasú), 2023

debates.showAs: Ministers and Secretaries (Attorney General) Bill 2023: Second Stage [Private Members]
Ministers and Secretaries (Attorney General) Bill 2023: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make further provision in relation to the office of the Attorney General.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú breise i ndáil le hoifig an Ard-Aighne.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Airí agus Rúnaithe (An tArd-Aighne), 2023

debates.showAs: Autism Bill 2022: Second Stage [Private Members]
Autism Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for an autism strategy to be prepared and published, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le straitéis uathachais a ullmhú agus a fhoilsiú, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Uathachais, 2022

debates.showAs: Living Wage Bill 2022: Second Stage [Private Members]
Living Wage Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the law relating to the determination, declaration and review of a national minimum hourly rate of pay for employees so as to arrive at and thereafter preserve an hourly rate that represents a living income; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an dlí a bhaineann le ráta pá íosta náisiúnta san uair an chloig d’fhostaithe a chinneadh, a dhearbhú agus a athbhreithniú chun teacht ar ráta san uair an chloig atá in ionannas le hioncam maireachtála agus an ráta sin a chaomhnú ina dhiaidh sin; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Pá Maireachtála, 2022

debates.showAs: Education (Admission to Schools) (Co-Education) Bill 2022: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to disapply at separate future dates, in relation to recognised primary and post-primary schools, the exemption provided by certain enactments from the prohibition against discrimination on the gender ground in educational establishments, and to provide for connected matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun an díolúine a fhoráiltear le hachtacháin áirithe, is díolúine ón toirmeasc ar idirdhealú ar an bhforas inscne i mbunachais oideachais, a dhífheidhmiú ar dhátaí ar leithligh sa todhchaí i ndáil le bunscoileanna agus iarbhunscoileanna aitheanta, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe comhghaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Oideachais (Ligean Isteach i Scoileanna) (Comhoideachas), 2022

debates.showAs: Dublin Bay Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Dublin Bay Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to establish a special committee of the Eastern and Midland Regional Assembly to serve as a Dublin Bay Authority; to provide as an objective for the Authority the preservation for current and future generations of the distinctive character of Dublin Bay and its ecology as a coastal resource; to confer on the Authority the function of proposing and promoting policies and priorities for the protection and enhancement of the environment, and in particular the water quality, of Dublin Bay and of its natural habitats and wildlife; and to provide for connected matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do bhunú coiste speisialta de chuid Thionól Réigiúnach an Oirthir agus Lár Tíre chun fónamh mar Údarás Chuan Bhaile Átha Cliath; do dhéanamh socrú chun go mbeidh sé mar chuspóir ag an Údarás saincháilíocht agus éiceolaíocht Chuan Bhaile Átha Cliath a chaomhnú mar acmhainn chósta don ghlúin seo agus do na glúine atá le teacht; do thabhairt feidhm don Údarás maidir le beartais agus tosaíochtaí a mholadh agus a chur chun cinn chun comhshaol Chuan Bhaile Átha Cliath a chosaint agus a fheabhsú, cáilíocht an uisce go háirithe, mar aon lena ghnáthóga nádúrtha agus a fhiadhúlra; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe comhghaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chuan Bhaile Átha Cliath, 2021

debates.showAs: Residential Tenancies (Tenants' Rights) Bill 2021: Second Stage [Private Members]
Residential Tenancies (Tenants' Rights) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Residential Tenancies Acts 2004 to 2020 so as to provide for greater security of tenure and rent certainty for tenants, and to provide for connected matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú na nAchtanna um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe, 2004 go 2020 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le ráthaíocht tionachta níos mó agus cinnteacht cíosa le haghaidh tionóntaí, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe comhghaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thionóntachtaí Cónaithe (Cearta Tionóntaí), 2021

debates.showAs: Protection of Employment (Platform Workers and Bogus Self-Employment) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to declare the relationship between employer and employee to be a status relationship, to declare the question whether an individual is an employee or is self-employed to be a question of law to be independently determined, to provide that the description given by the parties shall not be conclusive in determining the true status of an employment relationship, to provide for a presumption in favour of employee status in certain cases, to clarify the employment status of individuals who undertake personally to execute work or service for third parties, to take certain measures to counter the misrepresentation of the status of employees, to amend the Terms of Employment (Information) Act 1994, and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht dá dhearbhú gur caidreamh stádais an caidreamh idir fostóir agus fostaí, dá dhearbhú gur ceist dlí í an cheist i dtaobh an fostaí nó an duine féinfhostaithe pearsa aonair, ar ceist dlí í a bheidh le cinneadh go neamhspleách, do dhéanamh socrú nach tuairisc chríochnaitheach an tuairisc a thabharfaidh na páirtithe le linn stádas fírinneach caidrimh fostaíochta a chinneadh, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le toimhde i bhfabhar stádas fostaí i gcásanna áirithe, do shoiléiriú stádas fostaíochta pearsana aonair a ghabhfaidh orthu féin obair nó seirbhís a chur i gcrích go pearsanta do thríú páirtithe, do dhéanamh bearta áirithe chun cur i gcoinne stádas fostaithe a mhífhaisnéisiú, do leasú an Achta um Théarmaí Fostaíochta (Faisnéis), 1994, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Protection of Employment (Platform Workers and Bogus Self-Employment) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chaomhnú Fostaíochta (Oibrithe Ardáin agus Féinfhostaíocht Bhréagach), 2021

debates.showAs: Gambling (Prohibition of Advertising) Bill 2021: Second Stage
Gambling (Prohibition of Advertising) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to regulate in the public interest advertising and sponsorship of gambling; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh rialáil, ar mhaithe le leas an phobail, ar fhógraíocht agus urraíocht ar chearrbhachas; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chearrbhachas (Fógraíocht a Thoirmeasc), 2021

debates.showAs: Organisation of Working Time (Reproductive Health Related Leave) Bill 2021 [Seanad]: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Organisation of Working Time (Reproductive Health Related Leave) Bill 2021 [Seanad]: Second Stage [Private Members]
Organisation of Working Time (Reproductive Health Related Leave) Bill 2021: Committee Stage (Resumed) and Remaining Stages
Organisation of Working Time (Reproductive Health Related Leave) Bill 2021: Committee Stage
Organisation of Working Time (Reproductive Health Related Leave) Bill 2021: Second Stage
Organisation of Working Time (Reproductive Health Related Leave) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for a period of paid leave consequent upon miscarriage or for the purposes of availing of reproductive healthcare; for that purpose to amend the Organisation of Working Time Act 1997; to extend the protection against unfair dismissals conferred by the Unfair Dismissals Acts 1977 to 2015; to provide for the consequential amendment of certain other Acts; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le tréimhse saoire le pá de dhroim breith anabaí nó chun leas a bhaint as cúram sláinte atáirgthe; chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta um Eagrú Ama Oibre, 1997; do leathnú na cosanta ar dhífhostú éagórach a thugtar leis na hAchtanna um Dhífhostú Éagórach, 1977 go 2015; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le leasú iarmhartach a dhéanamh ar Achtanna áirithe eile; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Organisation of Working Time (Reproductive Health Related Leave) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Eagrú Ama Oibre (Saoire a Bhaineann le Sláinte Atáirgthe), 2021

debates.showAs: Adoption (Information and Tracing) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for improved information and tracing for adopted persons in relation to their adoption, for that purpose to amend the Adoption Act 2010 so as to provide for access by adult adopted persons to the index maintained by an tArd-Chláraitheoir of connections between entries in the Adopted Children Register and the register of births, and to provide for connected matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le faisnéis agus rianú feabhsaithe do dhaoine uchtaithe i ndáil lena n-uchtáil, chun na críche sin do leasú an Achta Uchtála, 2010 d’fhonn socrú a dhéanamh maidir le rochtain a bheith ag daoine uchtaithe fásta ar an treoir, arna cothabháil ag an Ard-Chláraitheoir, de cheangail idir iontrálacha sa Chlár d’Uchtleanaí agus i gclár na mbreitheanna, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe comhghaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Uchtála (Faisnéis agus Rianú), 2021

debates.showAs: Planning and Development (Amendment) Bill 2021: Second Stage
Planning and Development (Amendment) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to restrict applications for change of use of certain student accommodation units; and to provide for connected matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun iarratais ar athrú ar úsáid aonad cóiríochta áirithe do mhic léinn a shrianadh; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe comhghaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Pleanáil agus Forbairt (Leasú), 2021

debates.showAs: Local Government (Use of CCTV in Prosecution of Offences) Bill 2021: Second Stage
Local Government (Use of CCTV in Prosecution of Offences) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make provision in relation to the prevention, investigation, detection and prosecution by local authorities of certain offences; to provide for the use of closed circuit television in public places by local authorities for the purposes of those functions; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú i ndáil le húdaráis áitiúla do chosc, d’imscrúdú, do bhrath agus d’ionchúiseamh cionta áirithe; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le húdaráis áitiúla d’úsáid teilifís ciorcaid iata in áiteanna poiblí chun críocha na bhfeidhmeanna sin; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Local Government (Use of CCTV in Prosecution of  Offences) Bill 2021
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Rialtais Áitiúil (TCI a Úsáid le linn Cionta a Ionchúiseamh), 2021

debates.showAs: Student Nurses (Pay) Bill 2021: Order for Second Stage
Student Nurses (Pay) Bill 2021: Second Stage
Student Nurses (Pay) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to make provision in relation to the pay of student nurses.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú i ndáil le pá altraí foghlama.
bill.shortTitleGa: Bille na nAltraí Foghlama (Pá), 2021

debates.showAs: Period Products (Free Provision) Bill 2021: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to secure the general availability, free of charge, of period products.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun infhaighteacht ghinearálta táirgí míosta, saor in aisce, a áirithiú.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Tháirgí Míosta (Soláthar Saor in Aisce), 2021

debates.showAs: Industrial Relations (Joint Labour Committees) Bill 2019: Second Stage
Industrial Relations (Joint Labour Committees) Bill 2019: Second Stage (Resumed)
Industrial Relations (Joint Labour Committees) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the provisions relating to the constitution of joint labour committees, so as to provide for cases where organisations of employers or of workers fail or refuse to engage in consultation with the Labour Court prior to the appointment of representative (employers) members or representative (workers) members, as the case may be; and to provide for connected matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú na bhforálacha a bhaineann le comhdhéanamh comhchoistí oibreachais d’fhonn socrú a dhéanamh maidir le cásanna ina mainníonn nó ina ndiúltaíonn eagraíochtaí fostóirí nó eagraíochtaí oibrithe gabháil do chomhchomhairliúchán leis an gCúirt Oibreachais sula gceapfar comhaltaí ionadaíocha (fostóirí) nó comhaltaí ionadaíocha (oibrithe), de réir mar a bheidh; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe comhghaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Caidrimh Thionscail (Comhchoistí Oibreachais), 2019

debates.showAs: Community Participation (Disability) (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2019: Second Stage
Community Participation (Disability) (Miscellaneous Provisions) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to promote better provision in respect of the use by persons with disabilities of certain buildings and other places and transport services and for that purpose, to amend the Local Government Act 2001, the Planning and Development Act 2001, the Public Transport Regulation Act 2009 and the Building Regulations 1997; to provide for the commencement of certain provisions of the Citizens Information Act 2007; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú feabhsaithe a chur chun cinn i leith úsáid foirgneamh áirithe agus áiteanna eile agus seirbhísí iompair ag daoine faoi mhíchumas agus, chun na críche sin, do leasú an Achta Rialtais Áitiúil, 2001, an Achta um Pleanáil agus Forbairt, 2001, an Achta um Rialáil Iompair Phoiblí, 2009 agus na Rialachán Foirgníochta, 1997; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le tosach feidhme forálacha áirithe den Acht um Fhaisnéis do Shaoránaigh, 2007; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Rannpháirtíocht Phobail (Míchumas) (Forálacha Ilghnéitheacha), 2019

debates.showAs: Electoral (Civil Society Freedom)(Amendment) Bill 2019: Second Stage
Electoral (Civil Society Freedom) (Amendment) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Electoral Act 1997 to protect the right to freedom of association and expression for civil society organisations in Ireland and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Toghcháin, 1997 chun an ceart chun saoirse comhlachais agus saoirse chun tuairimí a nochtadh a chosaint i gcomhair eagraíochtaí na sochaí sibhialta in Éirinn agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Toghcháin (Saoirse na Sochaí Sibhialta) (Leasú), 2019

debates.showAs: Public Sector (Plain Language) Bill 2019: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to improve access to public sector information and services by requiring plain writing in published documents; and to provide for connected matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht d’fheabhsú na rochtana ar fhaisnéis agus ar sheirbhísí earnála poiblí trína cheangal go mbeidh scríobh soiléir i ndoiciméid fhoilsithe; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe comhghaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um an Earnáil Phoiblí (Teanga Shoiléir), 2019

debates.showAs: Irish Nationality and Citizenship (Naturalisation of Minors Born in Ireland) Bill 2018: Committee Stage (Resumed)
Irish Nationality and Citizenship (Naturalisation of Minors Born in Ireland) Bill 2018: Committee Stage
Irish Nationality and Citizenship (Naturalisation of Minors Born in Ireland) Bill 2018: Second Stage
Irish Nationality and Citizenship (Naturalisation of Minors Born in Ireland) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the law in relation to applications for a certificate of naturalisation by minors born in the island of Ireland; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an dlí i ndáil le hiarratais ar dheimhniú eadóirseachta ó mhionaoisigh a rugadh in oileán na hÉireann; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleEn: Irish Nationality and Citizenship (Naturalisation of Minors Born in Ireland) Bill 2018
bill.shortTitleGa: Bille Náisiúntachta agus Saoránachta Éireann (Eadóirsiú Mionaoiseach a Rugadh in Éirinn), 2018

debates.showAs: Free Education (Prohibition of Fees and Charges) Bill 2018: Committee Stage
Free Education (Prohibition of Fees and Charges) Bill 2018: Second Stage
Free Education (Prohibition of Fees and Charges) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled An Act to prohibit recognised schools, subject to certain exceptions, from charging admission or enrolment fees or from otherwise seeking contributions from parents towards meeting the costs and expenses incurred in providing education at that school; and to provide for connected matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thoirmeasc ar scoileanna aitheanta, faoi réir eisceachtaí áirithe, táillí maidir le ligean isteach nó rollú a mhuirearú nó ranníocaí a lorg ó thuismitheoirí thairis sin faoi chomhair íoc na gcostas agus na gcaiteachas arna dtabhú i soláthar an oideachais sa scoil sin; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe comhghaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Free Education (Prohibition of Fees and Charges) Bill 2018
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Shaoroideachas (Toirmeasc ar Tháillí agus ar Mhuirir), 2018

debates.showAs: Short-term Lettings Bill 2018: Second Stage
Short-term Lettings Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to declare the use of dwellings for short-term lettings to be used for commercial purposes; to remove the exemption of property services provided in connection with short-term lettings from the application of the Property Services (Regulation) Act 2011; to oblige persons who provide services in connection with short-term lettings of dwellings to furnish information upon request to the relevant planning authority; and to provide for connected matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhearbhú úsáid teaghaisí le haghaidh ligin ghearrthéarma a bheidh le húsáid chun críocha tráchtála; do chur deireadh le díolmhú seirbhísí maoine a sholáthraítear i dtaca le ligin ghearrthéarma ó fheidhm an Achta um Sheirbhísí Maoine (Rialáil), 2011; do chur oibleagáide ar dhaoine a sholáthraíonn seirbhísí i dtaca le ligin ghearrthéarma teaghaisí faisnéis a thabhairt don údarás pleanála iomchuí ar sin a iarraidh; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe comhghaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Ligin Ghearrthéarma 2018

debates.showAs: Prohibition of Conversion Therapies Bill 2018: Second Stage
Prohibition of Conversion Therapies Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to prohibit conversion therapy, as a deceptive and harmful act or practice against a person's sexual orientation, gender identity and, or gender expression.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do thoirmeasc teiripe thiontúcháin mar ghníomh nó cleachtas meabhlach agus dochrach in aghaidh gnéaschlaonadh, féiniúlacht inscne agus/nó léiriú inscne duine.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Thoirmeasc ar Theiripí Tiontúcháin, 2018

debates.showAs: Protection of Employment (Measures to Counter False Self-Employment) Bill 2018: Committee Stage
Protection of Employment (Measures to Counter False Self-Employment) Bill 2018: Second Stage
Protection of Employment (Measures to Counter False Self-Employment) Bill 2018: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to declare the relationship between employer and employee to be a status relationship, to declare the question whether an individual is an employee or is self-employed to be a question of law to be independently determined, to provide that the description given by the parties shall not be conclusive in determining the true status of an employment relationship, to provide protection for persons who are retained to carry out work and are incorrectly not designated as employees, to take certain measures to counter the misrepresentation of the status of employees as if they were working under a contract for services rather than a contract of service, and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht dá dhearbhú gur caidreamh stádais an caidreamh idir fostóir agus fostaí, dá dhearbhú gur ceist dlí í an cheist i dtaobh an fostaí nó an duine féinfhostaithe pearsa aonair, ar ceist dlí í a bheidh le cinneadh go neamhspleách, do dhéanamh socrú nach tuairisc chríochnaitheach an tuairisc a thabharfaidh na páirtithe le linn stádas fírinneach caidrimh fostaíochta a chinneadh, do chur cosaint ar fáil do dhaoine a fhostaítear chun obair a chur i gcrích agus nach ndéantar a ainmniú, mar ba chóir, mar fhostaithe, do dhéanamh bearta áirithe chun cur i gcoinne stádas fostaithe a mhífhaisnéisiú amhail is dá mba faoi chonradh le haghaidh seirbhísí a bheidís ag obair seachas faoi chonradh seirbhíse, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleEn: Protection of Employment (Measures to Counter False Self-Employment) Bill 2018
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chaomhnú Fostaíochta (Bearta chun Cur i gCoinne Bréag-Fhéinfhostaíochta), 2018

debates.showAs: Controlled Drugs and Harm Reduction Bill 2017: Order for Second Stage
Controlled Drugs and Harm Reduction Bill 2017: Second Stage
Controlled Drugs and Harm Reduction Bill 2017: Second Stage (Resumed)

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Misuse of Drugs Acts 1977-2016 to provide for the decriminalisation for possession of controlled drugs for personal use and to provide for regulations regarding personal use; to establish a Drug Dissuasion Service to case-manage persons found in possession of controlled drugs and to divert people away from the courts by providing a system of harm reduction measures including drug awareness, drug rehabilitation and community engagement programmes; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú na nAchtanna um Mí-Úsáid Drugaí, 1977 go 2016 chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le díchoiriúlú a dhéanamh ar shealbhú drugaí rialaithe chun úsáide pearsanta agus chun socrú a dhéanamh maidir le rialacháin a bhaineann le húsáid phearsanta; do bhunú Seirbhís Athchomhairliúcháin Drugaí chun daoine a bhfaightear drugaí rialaithe ina seilbh a chásbhainistiú agus chun daoine a athstiúradh ó na cúirteanna trí chóras de bhearta laghdaithe dochair a sholáthar, lena n-áirítear feasacht i leith drugaí, athshlánúchán ó dhrugaí agus cláir rannpháirtíochta pobail; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleEn: Controlled Drugs and Harm Reduction Bill 2017
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Dhrugaí Rialaithe agus um Dhochar a Laghdú, 2017

debates.showAs: Irish Human Rights and Equality Commission (Gender Pay Gap Information) Bill 2017: Second Stage [Private Members]
Irish Human Rights and Equality Commission (Gender Pay Gap Information) Bill 2017: Second Stage (Resumed) [Private Members]
Irish Human Rights and Equality Commission (Gender Pay Gap Information) Bill 2017: Referral to Select Committee [Private Members]
Irish Human Rights and Equality Commission (Gender Pay Gap Information) Bill 2017: Report and Final Stages
Irish Human Rights and Equality Commission (Gender Pay Gap Information) Bill 2017: Second Stage
Irish Human Rights and Equality Commission (Gender Pay Gap Information) Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to require certain employers to publish information relating to the pay of employees for the purpose of showing whether there are differences in the pay of male and female employees and, if so, the nature and scale of such differences; for that purpose to amend the Irish Human Rights and Equality Commission Act 2014; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht dá cheangal ar fhostóirí áirithe faisnéis a bhaineann le pá fostaithe a fhoilsiú chun a léiriú an bhfuil difríochtaí ann idir pá fostaithe fireanna agus pá fostaithe baineanna agus, más amhlaidh go bhfuil, chun cineál agus scála na ndifríochtaí sin a léiriú; chun na críche sin do leasú an Achta fá Choimisiún na hÉireann um Chearta an Duine agus Comhionannas, 2014; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleEn: Irish Human Rights and Equality Commission (Gender Pay Gap Information) Bill 2017
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille fá Choimisiún na hÉireann um Chearta an Duine agus Comhionannas (Faisnéis faoin Difríocht Pá idir na hInscní), 2017

debates.showAs: Adult Safeguarding Bill 2017: Restoration to Order Paper
Adult Safeguarding Bill 2017: Second Stage
Adult Safeguarding Bill 2017: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: for the purposes of making further and better provision for the care and protection of adults who are at risk; to establish the National Adult Safeguarding Authority; to require certain persons to make reports to the National Adult Safeguarding Authority in respect of adults at risk of abuse or harm in certain circumstances; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht chun socrú breise agus feabhsaithe a dhéanamh chun cúram agus cosaint a thabhairt d'aosaigh atá i mbaol; chun an t-Údarás Náisiúnta um Chosaint Aosach a bhunú; dá cheangal ar dhaoine áirithe tuarascálacha a thabhairt don Údarás Náisiúnta um Chosaint Aosach maidir le haosaigh atá i mbaol drochúsáide nó dochair in imthosca áirithe; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Aosaigh a Chosaint, 2017

debates.showAs: Pensions (Equal Pension Treatment in Occupational Benefit Scheme) (Amendment) Bill 2016: Second Stage
Pensions (Equal Pension Treatment in Occupational Benefit Scheme) (Amendment) Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the provisions of the Pension Act 1990 relative to equal pension treatment in occupational benefit schemes in order to provide for cases where employees who were unable to marry persons of the same sex may be deprived of certain pension benefits, and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú fhorálacha Acht na bPinsean, 1990 i ndáil le déileáil chomhionann i dtaca le pinsin i scéimeanna sochair ceirde d'fhonn socrú a dhéanamh maidir le cásanna ina bhféadfadh sé go gcoinneofaí sochair phinsin áirithe ó fhostaithe nach raibh in ann daoine den ghnéas céanna a phósadh, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleEn: Pensions (Equal Pension Treatment in Occupational Benefit Scheme) (Amendment) Bill 2016
bill.shortTitleGa: Bille na bPinsean (Déileáil Chomhionann i dtaca le Pinsin i Scéim Sochair Ceirde) (Leasú), 2016

debates.showAs: Convictions for Certain Sexual Offences (Apology and Exoneration) Bill 2016: Second Stage
Convictions for Certain Sexual Offences (Apology and Exoneration) Bill 2016: First Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for an apology to and exoneration of persons convicted of consensual same-sex sexual acts, on the grounds that prosecutions for such offences were improperly discriminatory, contrary to human dignity and in breach of personal privacy and autonomy; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le leithscéal a ghabháil le daoine agus daoine a shaoradh, is daoine a ciontaíodh i ngníomhartha gnéasacha toiliúla idir daoine den ghnéas céanna, ar na forais go raibh ionchúisimh i gcionta den sórt sin idirdhealaitheach go míchuí, go raibh siad contrártha do dhínit an duine agus gur sháraigh siad an phríobháideacht phearsanta agus an fhéinriaracht phearsanta; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleEn: Convictions for Certain Sexual Offences (Apology and Exoneration) Bill 2016
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chionta Gnéasacha Áirithe (Leithscéal a Ghabháil agus Saoradh), 2016

act.longTitleEn: Act to amend the Competition Act 2002 to provide that section 4 of that Act shallnot apply to collective bargaining and agreements in respect of certain categories ofworkers; and to provide for related matters.
act.longTitleGa: Acht do leasú an Achta Iomaíochta, 2002 chun socrú a dhéanamh nach mbeidh feidhm ag alt 4 den Acht sin maidir le cómhargántaíocht agus comhaontuithe comhchoiteanna i leithearnálacha áirithe oibrithe; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.

debates.showAs: Competition (Amendment) Bill 2016 [Seanad]: Order for Report Stage
Competition (Amendment) Bill 2016 [Seanad]: Report and Final Stages

chamber.showAs: Select Committee on Jobs, Enterprise and Innovation

Competition (Amendment) Bill 2016: Committee Stage
Competition (Amendment) Bill 2016: Restoration to Order Paper
Competition (Amendment) Bill 2016: Order for Second Stage
Competition (Amendment) Bill 2016: Second Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to amend the Competition Act 2002 to provide that section 4 of that Act shallnot apply to collective bargaining and agreements in respect of certain categories ofworkers; and to provide for related matters.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta Iomaíochta, 2002 chun socrú a dhéanamh nach mbeidh feidhm ag alt 4 den Acht sin maidir le cómhargántaíocht agus comhaontuithe comhchoiteanna i leithearnálacha áirithe oibrithe; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille Iomaíochta (Leasú), 2016

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to remove the prohibition on marriage between persons who are of the same sex
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do chur deireadh leis an toirmeasc ar phósadh idir daoine ar den ghnéas céanna  iad
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chlárú Sibhialta (Comhionannas Pósta), 2013

act.longTitleEn: Act to provide for certain changes in the exclusion of discrimination on particular grounds in certain employments; to provide for certain changes relating to discriminatory job advertisements; to give further effect to Council Directive 2000/43/EC  of 29 June 2000. implementing the principle of equal treatment between persons irrespective of racial and ethnic origin; to give further effect to Council Directive 2000/78/EC of 27 November 2000 establishing a general framework for equal treatment in employment and occupation; to give further effect to Council Directive 2004/113/EC of 13 December 2004 implementing the principle of equal treatment between men and women in the access to and supply of goods and services; to give further effect to Directive 2006/54/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 5 July 2006 on the implementation of the principle of equal opportunities and equal treatment of men and women in matters of employment and occupation (recast); to prohibit discrimination in the provision of accommodation on the basis of receipt of certain payments; and for those and other purposes to amend the Pensions Act 1990; the Employment Equality Act 1998 and the Equal Status Act 2000 and to provide for matters connected therewith
act.longTitleGa: Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le hathruithe áirithe ar an eisiamh i dtaobh idirdhealú ar fhorais shonracha i bhfostaíochtaí áirithe; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le hathruithe áirithe a bhaineann le fógráin poist idirdhealaitheacha; do thabhairt tuilleadh éifeachta do Threoir 2000/43/CE an 29 Meitheamh 2000 ón gComhairle lena gcuirtear i ngníomh an prionsabal um chóir chomhionann idir daoine gan beann ar bhunadh cine ná bunadh eitneach; do thabhairt tuilleadh éifeachta do Threoir 2000/78/CE an 27 Samhain 2000 ón gComhairle lena mbunaítear creat ginearálta do chóir chomhionann maidir le fostaíocht agus slí bheatha; do thabhairt tuilleadh éifeachta do Threoir 2004/113/CE an 13 Nollaig 2004 ón gComhairle lena gcuirtear i ngníomh an prionsabal um chóir chomhionann idir fir agus mná maidir le rochtain ar earraí agus ar sheirbhísí agus soláthar earraí agus seirbhísí; do thabhairt tuilleadh éifeachta do Threoir 2006/54/CE an 5 Iúil 2006 ó Pharlaimint na hEorpa agus ón gComhairle maidir le cur i ngníomh an phrionsabail um chomhdheiseanna agus um chóir chomhionann d'fhir agus do mhná i gcúrsaí fostaíochta agus slí beatha (athmhúnlú); do thoirmeasc idirdhealú maidir le cóiríocht a sholáthar ar bhonn íocaíochtaí áirithe a fháil; agus chun na gcríoch sin agus chun críoch eile do leasú Acht na bPinsean, 1990, an Achta um Chomhionannas Fostaíochta, 1998 agus an Achta um Stádas Comhionann, 2000 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe a bhaineann leis an méid sin

Employment Equality (Amendment) (No. 2) Bill 2013: Committee Stage (Resumed)
Employment Equality (Amendment) (No. 2) Bill 2013: Committee Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for certain changes in the exclusion of discrimination on particular grounds in certain employments; to provide for certain changes relating to discriminatory job advertisements; to give further effect to Council Directive 2000/43/EC  of 29 June 2000. implementing the principle of equal treatment between persons irrespective of racial and ethnic origin; to give further effect to Council Directive 2000/78/EC of 27 November 2000 establishing a general framework for equal treatment in employment and occupation; to give further effect to Council Directive 2004/113/EC of 13 December 2004 implementing the principle of equal treatment between men and women in the access to and supply of goods and services; to give further effect to Directive 2006/54/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 5 July 2006 on the implementation of the principle of equal opportunities and equal treatment of men and women in matters of employment and occupation (recast); to prohibit discrimination in the provision of accommodation on the basis of receipt of certain payments; and for those and other purposes to amend the Pensions Act 1990; the Employment Equality Act 1998 and the Equal Status Act 2000 and to provide for matters connected therewith
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le hathruithe áirithe ar an eisiamh i dtaobh idirdhealú ar fhorais shonracha i bhfostaíochtaí áirithe; do dhéanamh socrú maidir le hathruithe áirithe a bhaineann le fógráin poist idirdhealaitheacha; do thabhairt tuilleadh éifeachta do Threoir 2000/43/CE an 29 Meitheamh 2000 ón gComhairle lena gcuirtear i ngníomh an prionsabal um chóir chomhionann idir daoine gan beann ar bhunadh cine ná bunadh eitneach; do thabhairt tuilleadh éifeachta do Threoir 2000/78/CE an 27 Samhain 2000 ón gComhairle lena mbunaítear creat ginearálta do chóir chomhionann maidir le fostaíocht agus slí bheatha; do thabhairt tuilleadh éifeachta do Threoir 2004/113/CE an 13 Nollaig 2004 ón gComhairle lena gcuirtear i ngníomh an prionsabal um chóir chomhionann idir fir agus mná maidir le rochtain ar earraí agus ar sheirbhísí agus soláthar earraí agus seirbhísí; do thabhairt tuilleadh éifeachta do Threoir 2006/54/CE an 5 Iúil 2006 ó Pharlaimint na hEorpa agus ón gComhairle maidir le cur i ngníomh an phrionsabail um chomhdheiseanna agus um chóir chomhionann d'fhir agus do mhná i gcúrsaí fostaíochta agus slí beatha (athmhúnlú); do thoirmeasc idirdhealú maidir le cóiríocht a sholáthar ar bhonn íocaíochtaí áirithe a fháil; agus chun na gcríoch sin agus chun críoch eile do leasú Acht na bPinsean, 1990, an Achta um Chomhionannas Fostaíochta, 1998 agus an Achta um Stádas Comhionann, 2000 agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe a bhaineann leis an méid sin
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chomhionannas (Forálacha Ilghnéitheacha), 2013

debates.showAs: Civil Registration (Amendment) Bill 2011: Order for Second Stage
Civil Registration (Amendment) Bill 2011: Second Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to enable the Minister for Social Protection to designate bodies which may apply for the registration of members to solemnise marriages
bill.longTitleGa: á chumasú don Aire Coimirce Sóisialaí comhlachtaí a ainmniú a fhéadfaidh iarratas a dhéanamh ar chomhaltaí a chlárú chun póstaí a shollúnú
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chlárú Sibhialta (Leasú), 2011

debates.showAs: Female Genital Mutilation Bill 2010: Order for Second Stage.
Female Genital Mutilation Bill 2010: Second Stage

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the offence of female genital mutilation, and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cion arb é a bheidh ann ciorrú ball giniúna baineann, agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chiorrú Ball Giniúna Baineann 2010 2010

debates.showAs: Consumer Protection (Gift Vouchers) Bill 2009: Second Stage.
Consumer Protection (Gift Vouchers) Bill 2009: First Stage.

bill.longTitleEn: Consumer Protection (Gift Vouchers) Bill 2009
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do leasú an Achta um Chosaint Tomhaltóirí 2007
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chosaint Tomhaltóirí (Dearbháin Bhronntanais) 2009

debates.showAs: Mental Capacity and Guardianship Bill 2008: First Stage.

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to reform the law concerning mental capacity, to provide for informal decision-making on behalf of adult persons who lack capacity in certain circumstances, to establish a Guardianship Board which may appoint Personal Guardians to deal with the property, financial matters and welfare of adult persons who lack capacity, to confer jurisdiction on the High Court in certain matters, to provide for the establishment of the office of Public Guardian and to set out the functions and powers of the Public Guardian, to amend and repeal various enactments for this purpose, and for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht d'athchóiriú an dlí a bhaineann le cumas meabhrach, do dhéanamh socrú maidir le cinnteoireacht neamhfhoirmiúil thar ceann aosach atá ar easnamh cumais in imthosca áirithe, do bhunú Bord Caomhnóireachta a fhéadfaidh Caomhnóirí Pearsanta a cheapadh chun déileáil le maoin, gnóthaí airgeadais agus leas aosach atá ar easnamh cumais, do thabhairt dlínse don Ard-Chúirt i nithe áirithe, do dhéanamh socrú chun oifig an Chaomhnóra Phoiblí a bhunú agus do leagan amach fheidhmeanna agus chumhachtaí an Chaomhnóra Phoiblí, do leasú agus d'aisghairm achtachán éagsúil chun na críche sin, agus i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chumas Meabhrach agus Caomhnóireacht 2008

debates.showAs: Credit Union Savings Protection Bill 2008: First Stage.

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to provide for the establishment of the Credit Union Savings Protection Company; to establish a statutory scheme for the protection of savings of members of Credit Unions; to establish arrangements for financial assistance to Credit Unions; and to provide for related matters
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht do dhéanamh socrú chun an Chuideachta um Chosaint Coigiltis Comhair Creidmheasa a bhunú; do bhunú scéim reachtúil chun coigilteas de chuid comhaltaí de Chomhair Chreidmheasa a chosaint; do bhunú socruithe le haghaidh cúnaimh airgeadais do Chomhair Chreidmheasa; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe gaolmhara
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chosaint Coigiltis Comhair Creidmheasa 2008

debates.showAs: Broadband Infrastructure Bill 2008: Order for Second Stage.
Broadband Infrastructure Bill 2008: Second Stage.

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to ensure the provision of high quality and affordable broadband nationwide by setting given quality and uptake targets; to place duties upon the Minister as to the achievement of those targets; to specify reporting procedures to be taken if targets are not met; to establish a Broadband Network and Commission to facilitate the objectives of the Act; to reform certain regulations relating to the provision of broadband; and to provide for matters connected therewith.
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht dá chinntiú go ndéanfar leathanbhanda ardcháilíochta incheannaithe a sholáthar ar bhonn náisiúnta trí spriocanna socraithe cáilíochta agus glactha a leagan síos; do leagan dualgas ar an Aire maidir leis na spriocanna sin a bhaint amach; do shonrú nósanna imeachta tuairiscithe a bheidh le glacadh mura n-aimseofar spriocanna; do bhunú Gréasáin Leathanbhanda agus Coimisiúin Leathanbhanda d'fhonn cuspóirí an Achta a éascú; d'athchóiriú rialachán áirithe a bhaineann le soláthar leathanbhanda; agus do dhéanamh socrú i dtaobh nithe a bhaineann leis an méid sin.
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Bonneagar Leathanbhanda 2008

debates.showAs: Climate Protection Bill 2007: Order for Second Stage.
Climate Protection Bill 2007: Second Stage.

bill.longTitleEn: Bill entitled an Act to ensure the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions by setting annual targets and long-term targets; to place duties upon the Minister as to the achievement of those targets; to specify reporting procedures and action to be taken if targets are not met; and for connected purposes
bill.longTitleGa: Bille dá ngairtear Acht d'áirithiú go laghdófar astuithe gáis cheaptha teasa trí spriocanna bliantúla agus spriocanna fadtéarma a leagan síos; do chur dualgas ar an Aire i dtaca leis na spriocanna sin a bhaint amach; do shonrú nósanna imeachta maidir le tuairisciú agus gnímh a bheidh le déanamh mura n-aimseofar na spriocanna; agus chun críoch comhghaolmhar
bill.shortTitleGa: An Bille um Chosaint Aeráide 2007
